metadata.description: Supply Chain Risk Management - Supply chain security - MAPPED

controls.Name: SR-1-description - Policy and Procedures

details: Develop and document supply chain risk management policy and procedures
Establish supply chain risk management roles and responsibilities
Define supply chain risk management processes and workflows
Create supply chain risk management documentation and templates
Establish policy review and update processes

controls.notes: AWS functions support policy and procedures through supply chain risk management, monitoring, and security capabilities

controls.Name: SR-2-description - Supply Chain Risk Management Plan

details: Develop supply chain risk management plan
Identify supply chain risks and mitigation strategies
Establish supply chain risk tolerance and controls
Define supply chain risk monitoring processes
Review and update supply chain risk management plan

controls.notes: AWS functions support supply chain risk management plan through supply chain risk management, monitoring, and security capabilities

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring and assessment of supply chain risks and vulnerabilities
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced supply chain risk monitoring for SR-1 and SR-2 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of supply chain controls and process compliance
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced control monitoring for SR-3 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated tracking and monitoring of supply chain provenance and changes
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced provenance tracking for SR-4 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated vulnerability assessment of supply chain components and processes
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced vulnerability assessment for SR-5 and SR-6 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated threat detection and monitoring for supply chain security
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced threat detection for SR-7 and SR-9 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of supply chain component integrity and authenticity
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced integrity monitoring for SR-10 and SR-11 compliance
